StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMonthSummaryMcrdDischarge]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TrainingFileId uniqueidentifier, @Star.ngMonth date.me, @Dura.on int AS
BEGIN
DECLARE @DROP_DATE_BEGIN DATETIME DECLARE @DROP_DATE_END DATETIME
SET @DROP_DATE_BEGIN = CONVERT(varchar(4), YEAR(@Star.ngMonth)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), MONTH(@Star.ngMonth))+'-1' SET @DROP_DATE_END = DATEADD(month, @Dura.on, CONVERT(varchar(4), YEAR(@Star.ngMonth)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), MONTH(@Star.ngMonth)) + '-1')
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT COUNT(dis.nct rt.Ship_ID) AS MonthCount ,MONTH(rt.Drop_Date) AS CalendarMonth ,DATEDIFF(mm, @Star.ngMonth, rt.Drop_Date) AS MonthIndex FROM USMC.vwMcrissRecruitTraining AS rt INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissShipper AS Shipper ON rt.Ship_ID = Shipper.Ship_ID INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissContract AS c ON Shipper.Contract_ID = c.Contract_ID INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissNwa AS n ON n.NWA_ID = c.NWA_ID INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissCandidateStatus AS cs ON n.NWA_ID = cs.NWA_ID INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissStatusDisposi.on AS sd ON sd.Disposi.on_Code = cs.Disposi.on_Code AND sd.Status_Code = cs.Status_Code AND sd.Status_Type = cs.Status_Type INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissMarine AS m ON n.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID=m.MARINE_ID INNER JOIN USMC.TrainingFile AS . ON m.rowguid=..RecruiterID WHERE rt.Drop_Date >= @DROP_DATE_BEGIN AND rt.Drop_Date < @DROP_DATE_END AND ..ID =@TrainingFileId AND sd.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION='MCRD DISCHARGE' GROUP BY MONTH(rt.Drop_Date) ,DATEDIFF(mm, @Star.ngMonth, rt.Drop_Date) ORDER BY CalendarMonth
END
